text:
Jason Statham (born 26 July 1967) is an English Actor, Producer and former Model.
Statham is known for his roles in "Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels" (1998), "Snatch" (2000), "The One" (2001), "The Transporter" trilogy (2002–08), "The Italian Job", 2003, "Death Race", "Crank" (2006), "The Bank Job", "War" (2007), "The Expendables" (2010), and "The Expendables 2" (2014). Many of these roles are as antihero in action movies. He does most of his own stunts.
Statham was born on 26 July 1967 in Shirebrook, Derbyshire, England. He was raised in Great Yarmouth, Norfolk. Statham has been partners with Kelly Brook from 1997 until they separated in 2004. Then he has been partners with Rosie Huntington-Whiteley since 2010.

annotations.surface_form: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
